html:
8.23.20  3:01 pm   how evil are you?

      split the difference between rainbows and unicorns

8.23.20  2:51 pm   do you stand in doorways for inspiration then?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

8.23.20  2:11 pm   did you REALLY do a bad thing?

      no, i have only done good things, and a few things that are mildly questionable

8.23.20  1:52 pm   Are you working on something?

      yes

8.23.20  1:07 pm   For the chess scene in the intro to crazy/raining, did you actually play the computer to a draw, or did you animate the whole thing yourself? 

      animated it based on a real game, which had to be a draw

8.23.20  1:04 pm   are you proud of yourself for coming this far in music/video making?

      yes

8.23.20  12:50 pm   Will you make a new video soon?

      yes

8.23.20  12:40 pm   are you still stuck in the land of the 2 letter words

      no

8.23.20  12:22 pm   42 is the meaning of life, the universe and everything,

     i disagree

      but what is the unit? 42 whats?

8.23.20  12:11 pm   Do you enjoy making your videos?

      sometimes

8.23.20  12:10 pm   How glad mad your schemes can be?

      we'll see

8.23.20  11:50 am   can you give me a poem about names

      yes

8.23.20  11:21 am   favorite time signature

      regular

8.23.20  11:09 am   Do you remember a moment when inverted chords changed your life? 

      i don't really have any strict rules for what classifies as an inverted chord

8.23.20  10:54 am   what is your favorite cereal

      hotdog soup pizza, with pineapples

8.23.20  10:31 am   what type of music r u into

      normal

8.23.20  10:09 am   How did you select the notes for one-syllable songs like "die," "bears," "no," and "sheep"?

      had to use my imagination

8.23.20  9:10 am   Have you ever considered making a music video while singing entirely in an Italian accent?

      no. i've considered almost every other music video besides that one

8.23.20  8:18 am   why do you hate capital letters so much?

      i love them, but why on earth would you think i hate them

8.23.20  6:01 am   What happened to your very strong blimp that you can watch movies and play games while riding on it?

      tried to illustrate it

8.23.20  5:43 am   how do i identify chords in a song? most of the time i can only hear the top note, and chords have always felt very mysterious to me for this reason. can you learn to hear all individual notes,

     yes

      or do you just "feel" the intervals?

     yes also

     i found a secret trick yesterday where i play my guess for what the chord is on my keyboard, then listen to the chord in the song, then play my guess again. i could hear if my bottom note was too high or too low. (only tried this with 2-note "chords", though.) do you know any other secret tricks?

     play/pause, really quick, and just hunt for all the notes. this is how you can get started. and transcribe entire songs this way. then after 30 or 40 or 100 songs you will start to intuitively feel how the chords work and pretty soon you won't have search for individual notes anymore, you can just hear the chord. then after 600 or 1000 songs you will automatically know all the songs you've ever heard, just from memory, without even checking them

8.23.20  3:58 am   Do you think you are gonna run out of music?

      no

8.23.20  3:54 am   Used to be sad and was good at writing then. Am no longer sad and am no longer good at writing. How fix?

      write bad. will make you sad. fixed

8.23.20  3:48 am   How many tips in your "Soap Tips" video did you actually do?

      'talk about soap'

8.23.20  3:38 am   Do you think music critics are a good or a bad influence on music?

      no effect

8.23.20  3:35 am   The vocals "Bing bong Bayy-ooo" and "Ahhhhhh" in the song "I just did a bad thing" are incredible! How do you do it? How do you layer your voice over and over so it sounds like a chorus? 

      with every song you make, you get a little better at finding the right balance of the right ingredients

8.23.20  3:17 am   what's your favorite question that you've been asked

      this one

8.23.20  2:37 am   How are you doing like mentally and stuff 

      pretty good, my brain is about to encompass the whole world

8.23.20  2:28 am   Do you think higher music education can ever have adverse affects on a student's creativity?

      the highest music education is going out there and discovering it for yourself. that's as high as it gets right there

8.23.20  1:47 am   what music do you like

      regular

8.23.20  1:46 am   Did you end up paying your employees very much in the Mt saint Helen video? 

      they were mostly ghosts

8.23.20  1:15 am   what should I eat today?

      how about an entire week

8.23.20  1:03 am   what's the most obscure sound you've used in your songs that we might not have noticed?

      jeans

8.23.20  12:43 am   Did mt. Saint Helens blow up?

      that sounds like something it would do

8.23.20  12:40 am   whats the context behind the bookstacking video?

      just trying to get a feel for the space

8.23.20  12:14 am   what would the theme song sound like for a bubble floating through the park on a sleeting day?

      coy

8.23.20  12:07 am   how can i cope with the suffering in the world?

      sing songs of hope, faith, and joy

8.23.20  12:05 am   What inspires you?

      whenever i walk inside or outside, or through doors in general

8.22.20  11:59 pm   where do you get the inspiration for your videos?

      from the toilet, in the gutter. bet you didn't think they had toilets in the gutter, well here i am, as living proof

     what goes on in your mind?

     very ordinary, respectable thoughts

8.22.20  11:25 pm   Hello,I have had a rough few weeks and just wanted to ask how do you get inspired I always seem to lose my fire and want to see how you get yours to spark.

      how did it happen before

8.22.20  11:05 pm   does the song "when i get older" have a special meaning to you?

     yes

     you also seemed to have extra fun with the greenscreens there!

8.22.20  11:00 pm   Real talk: Do you fell like you have the authority to answer some of these people asking for life advice and stuff?

      no but i will try

8.22.20  9:47 pm   What is your main technique when writing songs?

      have an enjoyable time

8.22.20  9:25 pm   would you ever make a fully animated music video?

      yes

8.22.20  9:23 pm   Do you enjoy having ideas?

      it's even more fun to let them have me

8.22.20  8:55 pm   In the song la de da de da de da day oh, in the line that goes, "When will you come back home," did the person in question ever come back home? 

      not while the song is going on

8.22.20  8:30 pm   What's the meaning behind the lyrics of your music video "go back to where you belong"?

      in telling you to go back 'to where you belong', it invites you to think and wonder about where that may be.
     Wait, let me clarify. that is not the meaning of just the lyrics, that is the meaning of the lyrics and music together. the lyrics or music separately will usually have less meaning than when they are both put together

8.22.20  7:34 pm   how can i recreate music in order to gain some sort of understanding of how it works in terms of the names of notes and what they are

      just do it one note at a time. start with the melody

8.22.20  6:26 pm   Are things the same as they were, but slightly different? Or very different, slightly the same? Maybe both?

      yes

8.22.20  6:25 pm   do you like music?

      never heard of it
